column1: # Need Mapping:
# N00: reversible-architecture - Make architectural decisions reversible and changeable without rewriting everything
# N01: fault-tolerant-workflows - Workflows that can pause
column3: and survive crashes without losing work

column1: # N02: deferred-infrastructure-decisions - Defer database and infrastructure decisions until usage patterns emerge
# N03: evolutionary-architecture - Architecture that evolves through continuous adaptation rather than upfront prediction
# N04: deterministic-replay - Deterministic replay of computations for debugging and verification
# N05: automatic-provenance - Automatic data lineage and provenance tracking built into the architecture
# N06: interruptible-pipelines - Long-running analyses that can pause and resume at arbitrary points
# N07: complete-audit-trail - Complete audit trail of all state changes and their causality
# N08: quick-infrastructure-visualization - I need a quick way to visualize how much dizzy infrastructure has been completed
# N09: encryption-for-photo-storage - Encryption over MinIO for photo apps
# N10: shared-infrastructure-with-safety - Share the burden of infrastructure but need to remain safe
# N11: multi-language-support - As a developer
column2: I want to be able to use languages other than Python in DIZZY

column1: # N12: ai-assisted-design - As a user
column2: I want to be able to explain my ideas and have the computer assist me in their design

column1: # N13: understandable-documentation - As a user
column2: I want to be able to read about DIZZY and understand it

column1: # N14: deployability-visibility - As a developer
column2: I want to understand what the perceived deployability of a component or stack is

column1: # N15: time-travel-debugging - As a user
column2: leverage event sourcing for time travel debugging

column1: # N16: etl-idempotency - As a user
column2: leverage event sourcing for ETL idempotency

column1: # N17: provenance-tracking - As a user
column2: have provenance tracking capabilities from event sourcing

column1: # N18: instrumentation - Required for NVPSM / Maintence
# N19: find-pictures-of-people - Quickly find pictures of specific people in my photo collection
# N20: share-photos-with-friends - Notify friends with links to photos containing them when I take pictures
# N21: custom-album-organization - Create custom albums to organize photos how I want
# N22: automatic-date-organization - Have photos automatically organized by calendar/date
# N23: collaborative-photo-upload - Allow friends and family to remotely upload photos to my collection
# N24: shared-photo-viewing - Allow friends and family to remotely view photos and albums
# N25: preserve-harvested-data-compatibility - Preserve compatibility with data harvested from various drives
# Interaction strength values: 5 (strong)
